FuncDef: This command configures the rate for ICMP redirect messages issued on the router interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of ICMP redirect messages to send. This parameter must be specified with the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
Specifies the time frame in seconds used to limit the seconds of ICMP redirect messages that can be issued. Values-1 to 60.

ExtraInfo: Default: redirects 100 10 - Specifies a maximum of 100 redirect messages in 10 seconds.
